item.description:
Tall Ships Sail Boston 2009. Vessels will dock in the Seaport District, Fan Pier Basin, Rowes Wharf and at the historic wharfs of the North End and Charlestown.

Your welcome to walk along and view the docked vessels or take a 90-minute narrated cruise. We can break up into two groups depending on the interest.


Tall Ships 90-Minute Tall Ships Viewing Cruises. Order tickets for 1:00pm cruise.Cruise boat will go through the berthing channels and you'll have full broadside views of these majestic vessels while an expert narrator provides detailed information on each. Cost $40 Cruise tours will need tickets purchased in advance, this is a very popular event. Order tickets here: http://www.bostonharb...



This will be a crowded event, sun screen and water suggested. Heavy rain cancels. Carpooling and group train ride is suggested - please post interest in RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: Boston Harbor Cruise ticket booth (there is only one)
item.name: Tall Ships are coming to Boston!
